title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.1 - Determination of good moral character
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.1 - Determination of good moral character

State Regulations

The determination of whether an applicant for authorization
to practice a profession, under title VIII of the Education Law, is of good
moral character shall be made in accordance with the procedures specified in
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
28-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
